attributes.action: call a referendum on the Lisbon Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If ratified Britain will cease to be an independent nation. The EU will take on a legal personality of its own. Britain will become a subject province of the EU. 15% of the nation voted labour in the recent EU election, but this minority are quietly pushing through this legislation. Tony Blair will almost certainly become President of the EU thus making him a very powerful man.
